entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

Pressure: 101.9 kPa

Dewpoint: -38.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 34. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
